Hiking Trails

Name
Caddo Bend Hiking Trail
Description
The trail begins near the Arkansas State Park amphitheater and circles the entire peninsula back to its beginning.
Location
Crawdad Island Road Garland County, AR
Latitude: 34.617690 Longitude: -93.178400


Name
Dogwood Trail
Description
Perfect for a casual walk through the Ouachita National Forest, this trail highlights unique wildlife found throughout the region by interpretive signs.
Location
Mountain Pine Road Garland County, AR
Latitude: 36.37303 Longitude: -92.54833
Name
Woodpecker Hollow Nature Trail
Description
Located at the south end of the Denby Bay Area.The trailhead includes restrooms and an informational kiosk highlighting historical details of the trail and the lake.
Location
Ouachita Shores Pkwy Garland County, AR
Latitude: 34.55176 Longitude: -93.48933
